long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take notes directly from any web page.

Eofis, the learning journey company, unifies auto-generation, learning collaboration, and auto-scheduling in one easy-to-use platform. We offers the best and most reliable learning experience across Windows, Apple, Linux, iOS, and Android.

The Eofis Chrome Extension allows you to add material to your eofis library directly from any web page. With a simple right click, you can send the whole page or just a part to be processed and turned into questions by the eofis AI algorithms. These questions will be collected in a visual concept map so you will never lose them; you'll get the questions at the perfect time for you to practice, on an adaptive and efficient schedule that automatically updates with your learning schedule.

Eofis Chrome Extension allows you to:
• Highlight important information from a page or pdf to make questions from
• Get questions from a whole page or document
• View your eofis streak

What else can you do?

Eofis also offers:
• Visual concept map connecting all generated notes
• Google Calendar integration - eofis adapts to your life, not the other way around
• Multi-format question practice - flashcards, minigames and more
• Collaboration - practice in groups or alone

To learn more about eofis, please visit https://eofis.ie
